src:
Pemulangan Jenazah Afridza Munandar Tunggu Hasil Penyelidikan Polisi Malaysia
03 Nov 2019, 00:06 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Kedutaan Besar Republik Indonesia (KBRI) Kuala Lumpur mengatakan proses pemulangan pebalap Afridza Syach Munandar menunggu hasil autopsi Polisi Diraja Malaysia (PDRM). KBRI mengatakan autopsi jenazah Afridza akan dilakukan pagi nanti.
"(Pemulangan) tergantung hasil post mortem dari PDRM," kata Koordinator Fungsi Protokol dan Konsuler KBRI Kuala Lumpur Malaysia, Yusron B Ambary, Sabtu (2/10/2019).
Yusron menuturkan jenazah Afridza yang meninggal dalam balapan Asian Talent Cup akan diautpsi Minggu (3/10) pagi. Usai diautopsi, polisi akan mengumumkan penyebab kematian Afridza,
"Menurut informasi PDRM, besok pagi akan dilakukan post mortem atas jenazah, dan setelah itu akan di-release," ucap Yusron.
text:
Repatriation of Afridza Munandar's Body Awaits Results of Malaysian Police Investigation
Nov 03 2019, 00:06 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - The Indonesian Embassy in Kuala Lumpur said the process of returning Afridza driver Syach Munandar was awaiting the autopsy results of the Malaysian Diraja Police (PDRM). The Indonesian Embassy said the Afridza body autopsy would be carried out this morning.
"(Repatriation) depends on the post mortem results of the PDRM," said the Coordinator of the Protocol and Consular Functions of the Indonesian Embassy in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, Yusron B Ambary, Saturday (02/10/2019).
Yusron said the body of Afridza, who died in the Asian Talent Cup race, will be adopted on Sunday (3/10) morning. After the autopsy, the police will announce the cause of Afridza's death,
"According to PDRM information, tomorrow morning a post mortem will be carried out on the body, and after that it will be released," Yusron said.
